General.Name: Siglent Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Siglent Technologies CO., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services electronic test and measurement equipment in China and internationally. The company offers digital oscilloscopes, function/arbitrary waveform generators, spectrum and vector network analyzers, real time spectrum analyzers, RF/microwave signal generators, digital multi-meters, DC power supplies, handheld oscilloscopes, electronic loads, and other general test instruments. It serves communications, semiconductors, automotive electronics, medical and consumer electronics, government units, education and scientific research, and other markets. Siglent Technologies CO., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
